name: PromoteToView
description: Promotes packages to a specific view in an Azure DevOps feed.
author: Abhishek Kumar Singh
helpMarkDown: This task will promotes packages to a specific view in an Azure DevOps feed.

inputs.name: feedName
inputs.label: Feed Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter Feed Name where the package is to be promoted

inputs.name: feedScoped
inputs.label: Feed Scoped
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select whether the feed is scoped to a Project or Organization.

inputs.name: view
inputs.label: View
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter View Name where the package is to be promoted. E.g. Local, IDA, Release

inputs.name: nugetPackageMappingFilePath
inputs.label: NuGet package mapping file path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to NuGet package mapping file
